function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Continuous operation of UV lights and fans may lead to maintenance issues and malfunction","Impact":"Poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission due to ineffective air purification","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and inspection of UV lights and fans to ensure proper functioning","Technologies":"Remote monitoring systems for UV lights and fans to detect malfunctions early","People":"Ward staff, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Maintenance personnel, facility management"},{"Description":"Ineffective sterilization and exhaust of air may lead to contamination and disease spread","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised infection control","Mitigation":"Implementing redundant air sterilization systems and regular air quality testing","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, air quality monitoring sensors","People":"Ward staff, infection control team","Owner":"Infection control team, facility management"},{"Description":"Exposure of guinea pigs to ward air may lead to the transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission to the guinea pigs and potential spread to other animals or humans","Mitigation":"Implement strict quarantine measures for the guinea pigs and regular health monitoring","Technologies":"Quarantine enclosures, disease testing kits for animals","People":"Research staff, animal care personnel","Owner":"Research staff, facility management"}]}
